resources.string: Welcome To Saeed`s Medication Tracker App!
To Get Started, Please Enter The Following Information:
The Buttons Below Do As Followed:
View Records - View Saved Times Medications Were Taken At
Record Time - Saves Your Input And Stores It
App Details - View Details About The Application
In this app you can store the day in the week, day number, time, and month of when your medication was taken. You can store them in any way you like whether it be with words or numbers
